mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PTSCHEDULE(SNUM, TID, MID, PTDATE, TIMES) VALUES(SEQ_SNUM.NEXTVAL, #{tid}, #{mid}, #{ptdate}, #{times})
mapper.select: SELECT SNUM, S.TID, MID, NAME, PTDATE, TIMES FROM PTSCHEDULE S, TRAINNERS T WHERE S.TID=T.TID AND MID=#{mid} AND PTDATE = TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'))
SELECT SNUM, S.TID, MID, NAME, PTDATE, TIMES FROM PTSCHEDULE S, TRAINNERS T WHERE S.TID=T.TID AND MID=#{mid} AND PTDATE > TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'))
SELECT SNUM, S.TID, MID, NAME, PTDATE, TIMES FROM PTSCHEDULE S, TRAINNERS T WHERE S.TID=T.TID AND MID=#{mid} AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) > PTDATE
